testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to access the detailed information of the todo with the specified id number via the API connection.
testcase.name: admin Verify that sending a GET request with valid authorization and the correct ID to api/todo/{id}
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/todo/93" path parameters...........................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes 93, "", "qweqwe", 915, "2024-09-19", 2, "2024-09-10T00:31:14.000000Z" and "2024-09-12T10:23:02.000000Z"..passed
